derivation.yuyuan_name: (originally denoting the corn marigold): from Latin, from Greek khrusanthemon, from khrusos 'gold' + anthemon 'flower'

entry.def: A chrysanthemum is a large garden flower with many long, thin petals.

means.word_mean: 1. the flower of a chrysanthemum plant
2. any of numerous perennial Old World herbs having showy brightly colored flower heads of the genera Chrysanthemum; Argyranthemum; Dendranthema; Tanacetum; widely cultivated

jushi.english: The cold weather had most deleterious consequences among the chrysanthemums.
